The Devil and broker, or, A character of a pawn broker in a merry dialogue with their mainfold frauds and deceits discovered.
7 p.
Printed for J.C., London : 1677.
"With allowance, Roger L'Estrange." Caption title: A dialogue between a pawn-broker and a country-bumpkin. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
